convert_to_wsgi(respiter)[source]¶

将各类返回值转化为wsgi兼容对象 字典： 转化为json 空字符串，False, None, None True VALUES: ‘’ Unicode字符串（str）： bytes字符串 HttpError or HttpResponse 对象: FilesObject： FileWrapper Iterable or Generators： 迭代器对象或者生成器对象，并调用next方法

render_template(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

第一个参数被视为template name, {}视为关键字参数. template_plugin: Template Plugin class name template_dir: templates directory (used to find template)

模板内部的关键字参数全部使用kwargs传入或者在位置参数位置传入dict

reset(route=None)[source]¶
route(path=None, method='GET', callback=None, name=None, apply=None, skip=None, **config)[source]¶

路由装饰器函数 语法: @app.route(path=’/hello/<name>’) def hello_world(name):

return ‘hello world’ + str(name)
trigger_hook(hook_name, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
uninstall(plugin)[source]¶

Uninstall plugins. if plugin is a instance, remove that instance; if plugin is a Plugin class, remove all the instances with this class. if plugin is a string , remove the instance with that string name. if plugin is True, remove all plugins.

url_for(func_name, **kwargs)[source]¶

Parameters:new_url – url to redirct to

myframework.myframwork.run(app, host='127.0.0.1', port=8000, server='wsgiref', interval=1, quiet=False, reloader=False, plugins=None, debug=None, config=None, **kwargs)[source]¶
myframework.myframwork.static_file(filename, root, mimetype=True, download=False, charset='UTF-8', etag=None)[source]¶

serve static files.

@route(‘/static/<filepath:path>’) def server_static(filepath):

return static_file(filepath, root=’/path/to/your/static/files’)
Parameters:
  • filename – file’s filename
  • root – file’s root path
  • mimetype – guess mimetype. if string, use as file type, if bool, use mime to guess file type.
  • download – download to check this file. if is a string, use this string as download filename, if true, use original name.
  • charset – charset
  • etag – etag for efficient web
Returns:

Filelike object

from forms parse FileUpload file instance and return a dict {filename: FileUpload instance}

form¶

use cgi fieldstorage 解析 multipart body and return a FileStorage object

get_cookie(cookie_name)[source]¶
get_environ(env_item)[source]¶
get_form_value(value, default=None)[source]¶

get form value from forms :param value: form name :param default: if form name field not exists, use this default value to avoid error :return: FieldStorage instance or MiniFieldStorage instance with these attrs in f: f.name -> field name f.filename -> client filesystem filename when upload it f.value -> string value f.file -> filelike object f.type -> content type f.type_options -> 在HTTP请求行的内容类型行指定的选项字典 f.headers -> headers see: https://hg.python.org/cpython/file/2.7/Lib/cgi.py

static parse_range_header(header, maxlen=0)[source]¶

Yield (start, end) ranges parsed from a HTTP Range header. Skip unsatisfiable ranges. The end index is non-inclusive.

myframework.utils.trans_rfc_to_date_time(rfc_time)[source]¶

transfer frc time to seconds since 1970 >>> s = “Thu, 03 Oct 1997 17:15:00 GMT” >>> k = time.strptime(s, “%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S GMT”) >>> time.mktime(k) >>> 875870100.0
